description:
The velocity of water discharging from the <<turbine>><<outfall structure>> to the <<water course name>> at the point marked <<‘ref’>> shall not exceed <<xx>> metres per second.

No <<abstraction>><<power production>> shall take unless the fish protection modifications have been made to the leading edge of each turbine blade of the Archimedes screw turbine, as detailed in drawing <<Turbine fish protection modifications>> attached to this licence.

The Licence Holder shall ensure that the maximum revolutions per minute (rpm) <<of>> <<of each of>> the Archimedes screw turbine<<s>> shall not at any time exceed <<24, 30, 32>> rpm.
